name: Above The Pale
description:
What is this game?

This is an extremely early prototype of a "game" I'm kind of workshopping right now. Its just a little sandbox for me to play around in and build, not much of a game other than driving and exploring. Theres not much to see yet but I plan on adding more over time and making it a nice little world to exist in.

This page basically only exists so I can distribute the build to my friends easier, but if you want to download it and give your feedback that would also be appreciated!

Credits

Road Architect by MicroGDS

https://github.com/MicroGSD/RoadArchitect

FPS Controller by Colanderp

https://github.com/colanderp/UnityTutorials

HSV Color Picker by judah4
